titleStmt.title: An address from the justices of the peace of the county of Middlesex as it was ordered by the court at Hicks's Hall, and humbly presented to His Majesty by the body of the said justices, on Monday, the eighteenth of April, 1681. With His Majesties gracious answer.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: reprinted by Benjamin Tooke and John Crook, printers to the King's most excellent Majestie; and are to be sold by Mary Crook and Andrew Crook at His Majesties printing-house in Skinner-Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin, Ireland.
